name: Beyond the clouds
description:
End of third year group project at Creajeux.

Beyond the clouds is a cooperative action ( 3 players) pc game taking place into a fantastic word were everything is happening in the sky. You are controlling a flying ship and battling against collosal creatures with the help of the multiple weapons present on this ship.

How to play:

The ship is equipped with 3 differents turrets type:

  • 2 harpoons launcher at the front of the ship,  by using the 2 grapples onto the front wings of the monster, in a short span of time, you can attach the ship to it
  • The piercing turrets are used to break the weak-points armor (yellow bar)
  • The gatlings turrets are more efficient against the flesh under the armor of the weak-points (red bar)

You must first find the boss in the world with the help of the minimap present on-board of the ship. To engage combat with the boss you must follow the monster and grapple his 2 front wings with the 2 grappling hook. By finishing a weak-point the harpoon present on its side will become weak and you will need to grapple onto the bosse's other side. If the 2 grapple end up breaking the monster will flee and you will have to try and grapple him again.

Controls:

CharacterZQSD MovementSpace JumpMouse WheelZoom in and outLeft MouseAimRight mouseFireF InteractTab Escape menuEnter Chat Ship pilot stationZQSD Roll and pitchShift and CtrlSpeed up and downSpace Boost
